nodes.text: Hashar was a male Mandalorian living during the Galactic War. In 3630 BBY he answered the call by Mandalore the Avenger to join the clans in a raid on droid factory on the planet Darvannis. He was in the team led by Breyer Chorn with the goal to disable the shield generators and was one of the dozen warriors who fell to Eternal Empire Skytroopers along the way.
Hashar is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire Chapter 14: Mandalore the Avenger.
